result_list.explanation: Il veut partir. - This indicates a character's intent to move, but not an actual exit, so it fits under 'movement'.
Léonor et Marine se retirent. - This indicates characters exiting the stage, so it fits under 'exit'.
Il disparaît entièrement. - This indicates a movement where the character disappears, so it fits under 'movement'.
Il entre chez lui. - This indicates a character entering a location, so it fits under 'entrance'.
Joséphine et Marthe sortent. - This indicates characters exiting the stage, so it fits under 'exit'.
Elle veut sortir. - This indicates a character's intent to move, but not an actual exit, so it fits under 'movement'.
Orphise sort. - This indicates a character exiting the stage, so it fits under 'exit'.
Il lui serre la main plus fort. - This indicates a non-verbal interaction between characters, so it fits under 'interaction'.
result_list.stgdir: Il lui serre la main plus fort.

result_list.explanation: Il embrasse Ducrône et Jenneval. - This indicates a non-verbal interaction between characters, so it fits under 'interaction'.
Don César reçoit la main d'Isabelle. - This indicates a non-verbal interaction between characters, so it fits under 'interaction'.
